segment.source: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information
segment.target: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information

segment.source: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information
segment.target: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information

segment.source: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information
segment.target: How to View MED-V Settings and General Information

segment.source: How to View MED-V Settings
segment.target: How to View MED-V Settings

segment.source: To view MED-V settings
segment.target: To view MED-V settings

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, click Settings.
segment.target: On the submenu, click Settings.

segment.source: In the Settings dialog box, select the Load MED-V after Windows logon check box to load MED-V on startup.
segment.target: In the Settings dialog box, select the Load MED-V after Windows logon check box to load MED-V on startup.

segment.source: Select the Start Workspace when MED-V starts check box to automatically start the MED-V workspace on startup.
segment.target: Select the Start Workspace when MED-V starts check box to automatically start the MED-V workspace on startup.

segment.source: Configure the server properties described in the following table.
segment.target: Configure the server properties described in the following table.

segment.source: Server Settings
segment.target: Server Settings

segment.source: Property
segment.target: Property

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Server address
segment.target: Server address

segment.source: The server's DNS name or IP address.
segment.target: The server's DNS name or IP address.

segment.source: Server port
segment.target: Server port

segment.source: The server's port.
segment.target: The server's port.

segment.source: Encrypt connections (HTTPS)
segment.target: Encrypt connections (HTTPS)

segment.source: Select this check box to use encrypted connections.
segment.target: Select this check box to use encrypted connections.

segment.source: How to View MED-V General Information
segment.target: How to View MED-V General Information

segment.source: To view MED-V general information
segment.target: To view MED-V general information

segment.source: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.
segment.target: In the notification area, right-click the MED-V icon.

segment.source: On the submenu, point to Help, and then click About.
segment.target: On the submenu, point to Help, and then click About.

segment.source: The About Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization screen appears.
segment.target: The About Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization screen appears.
